long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Renew all your craigslist posts with a single click. Must be logged in, and on the https://accounts.craigslist.org/login/home page when clicking the button.

PR's welcome on github.

If you find this extension useful, please consider buying me a coffee, at least to cover the cost for me to post my extension on the chrome store :)
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kfunk
